article_text:
WBO lightweight title fight Champion Terence “Bud” Crawford vs. Yuriorkis Gamboa When: CenturyLink Center First bout: 6 p.m. Saturday Telecast: HBO 9 p.m.

Posted: Saturday, June 21, 2014 1:00 am

Copyright ©2016 Omaha World-Herald. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, displayed or redistributed for any purpose without permission from the Omaha World-Herald. To purchase rights to republish this article, please contact The World-Herald Store.

Posted in Sports, Local-sports on Saturday, June 21, 2014 1:00 am.

og.description: It seems silly now considering how things have turned out. But for a long time toward the beginning of his professional boxing career, Terence “Bud” Crawford was told this couldn’t be done.
og.title: Taking care of ‘Bud’
